content: MFT-MW Bracket Aluminum bracket for horizontal attachment of wood lathing ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Brackets- ### FEATURES:Features Multiple fastening options – can be installed using suitable anchors or screws Bracket with round and elongated holes for fixed and sliding points Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Applications Installation of different wooden lathing for wood substructures ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: EN AW-6063 T66 Technical Data | Material composition | EN AW-6063 T66 ### ITEMS- 2030897 - Bracket MFT-MW 50/70 M 6,5 - Package Size 50 pc - 2030900 - Bracket MFT-MW 60/70 M 6,5 - Package Size 50 pc - 2030895 - Bracket MFT-MW 50/70 L 6,5 - Package Size 50 pc - 2030894 - Bracket MFT-MW 50/70 L 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2030896 - Bracket MFT-MW 50/70 M 11 - Package Size 50 pc - 2030899 - Bracket MFT-MW 60/70 M 11 - Package Size 50 pc - 2030898 - Bracket MFT-MW 60/70 L 11 - Package Size 50 pc - 2030893 - Bracket MFT-MW 50/100 M 6,5 - Package Size 50 pc - 2030892 - Bracket MFT-MW 50/100 M 11 - Package Size 50 pc - 2030891 - Bracket MFT-MW 50/100 L 11 - Package Size 50 pc
